extendedInfo.description: Dow Group is a Business Solution company operating since 2002, based in Down Town, Beirut Lebanon and Dubai Media City UAE. We are a team of professionals specializing in web design, web Development, Mobile Application Development, E-commerce solutions, Credit Card Payment Gateways, Online Marketing and Social Media, all working toward one common goal: TAKING YOUR BUSINESS TO THE NEXT LEVEL!Throughout these ten years we have developed a process that ensures the successful completion of your project, no matter what country you live in, or your culture or type of business. Your website will be launched within the stipulated time, guaranteeing its success at unbeatable prices with a 24 hours service, 7 days a week & 365 days a year.From our offices in Beirut and Dubai, and our agents in different gulf and middle east region, oman, kuwait, qatar, iraq, jordan and bahrain, Dow Group serves more than 1400 satisfied companies in the region, USA, UK , Europe and worldwide.At Dow Group, we design your business
